examples: his dignity made him seem aloof and unsympathetic

definitions.text: (of characters in literature or drama) tending to evoke antipathetic feelings
examples: all the characters were peculiarly unsympathetic
a closed mind unreceptive to new ideas

definitions.text: not agreeing with your tastes or expectations
examples: found the task disagreeable and decided to abandon it
a job temperamentally unsympathetic to him
